Module tagtraum.audioplayer4j
Package com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j

Interface AudioDevice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAudioDevice, MixerAudioDevice
    public interface AudioDevice
    Represents an installed audio device. See AudioDevices.getAudioDevices() for a list of available devices.
    Author:
    Hendrik Schreiber

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Line getLine​(Line.Info info)
      Get a line from this device using the given Line.Info.
      Mixer getMixer()
      Obtain a Mixer from this device.
      String getName()
      Device name.
      boolean isDefault()
      Is this the system's default device?

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Device name.
        Returns:
        name

      • isDefault

        boolean isDefault()
        Is this the system's default device?
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getMixer

        Mixer getMixer()
        Obtain a Mixer from this device.
        Returns:
        mixer

      • getLine

        Line getLine​(Line.Info info)
      throws LineUnavailableException
        Get a line from this device using the given Line.Info.
        Parameters:
        info - info, describing what's desired
        Returns:
        line
        Throws:
        LineUnavailableException - if a matching line is not available due to resource restrictions
        IllegalArgumentException - if this device does not support any lines matching the description
